page.title: 20HOUSING
page.content: Housing development is governed by the policies of the Norfolk Structure Plan. Within the block this has largely restricted new housing to land within the village guidelines of New Beetley and Gressenhall. During the 1960's and 70's many new estates were built especially in Beetley. The current village guidelines allow for a much slower rate of growth in both villages. New estate development is likely to be restricted to the completion of existing unfinished estates. In a survey of 57 children aged 9-11 it was found that 17 lived on modern housing estates.
